subject: Softball
lead_paragraph: Caitlin Lowe had a two-run triple, and the United States beat Japan, 5-1, in Oklahoma City to win its fourth straight World Cup of Softball title in Jennie Finch’s final game for the national team.
snippet: Caitlin Lowe had a two-run triple, and the United States beat Japan, 5-1, in Oklahoma City to win its fourth straight World Cup of Softball title in Jennie Finch’s final game for the national team.
